name: West-Gate-Electron
description: A Eleactron app with react blog admin
author: jackieli

scripts.build:dev: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=dev  node .
scripts.build:qa: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=qa react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=qa  node .
scripts.build:prod: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prod react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=prod  node .
scripts.packager: npm run build && rimraf  dist && electron-builder
scripts.mac: npm run build && rimraf  dist && electron-builder -m
scripts.linux: npm run build && rimraf  dist && electron-builder -l
scripts.win: npm run build && rimraf  dist && electron-builder -w
scripts.packager:prod: npm run build && rimraf dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder
